content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_block
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 8, "index": 16}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 22}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 54, "index": 23}, {"type": "zombie_head", "quantity": 45, "index": 25}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 56, "index": 27}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 14, "index": 30}, {"type": "iron_trapdoor", "quantity": 27, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_fungus", "quantity": 36, "index": 35}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 36}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 44, "index": 40}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 11, "index": 43}, {"type": "gray_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a redstone block, I need to place 9 redstones in a 3x3 square on the crafting table. The first step is to move one redstone from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
